verses.verse: <WG2532> A great<WG3173> sign<WG4592> was seen<WG3700> in<WG1722> heaven:<WG3772> a woman<WG1135> clothed with<WG4016> the sun,<WG2246> and<WG2532> the moon<WG4582> under<WG5270> her<WG846> feet,<WG4228> and<WG2532> on<WG1909> her<WG846> head<WG2776> a crown<WG4735> of twelve<WG1427> stars.<WG792>
<WG2532> She was<WG2192> with<WG1722> child.<WG1064> She cried<WG2896> out in pain,<WG928> <WG2532> laboring<WG5605> to give birth.<WG5088>

<WG2532> Another<WG243> sign<WG4592> was seen<WG3700> in<WG1722> heaven.<WG3772> <WG2532> Behold,<WG2400> a great<WG3173> red<WG4450> dragon,<WG1404> having<WG2192> seven<WG2033> heads<WG2776> and<WG2532> ten<WG1176> horns,<WG2768> and<WG2532> on<WG1909> his<WG846> heads<WG2776> seven<WG2033> crowns.<WG1238>

<WG2532> His<WG846> tail<WG3769> drew<WG4951> one third<WG5154> of the stars<WG792> of the sky,<WG3772> and<WG2532> threw<WG906> them<WG846> to<WG1519> the earth.<WG1093> <WG2532> The dragon<WG1404> stood<WG2476> before<WG1799> the woman<WG1135> who was about<WG3195> to give birth,<WG5088> so<WG2443> that when<WG3752> she gave birth<WG5088> he might devour<WG2719> her<WG846> child.<WG5043>

<WG2532> She gave birth<WG5088> to<WG3195> a son,<WG730> a male child,<WG5207> who<WG3739> is to<WG3195> rule<WG4165> all<WG3956> the nations<WG1484> with<WG1722> a rod<WG4464> of iron.<WG4603> Her<WG846> child<WG5043> was caught up<WG726> to<WG4314> God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> to his<WG846> throne.<WG2362>

<WG2532> The woman<WG1135> fled<WG5343> into<WG1519> the wilderness,<WG2048> where<WG3699> she has<WG2192> a place<WG5117> prepared<WG2090> by<WG575> God,<WG2316> that<WG2443> there<WG1563> they may nourish<WG5142> her<WG846> one thousand<WG5507> two hundred<WG1250> sixty<WG1835> days.<WG2250>

<WG2532> There was<WG1096> war<WG4171> in<WG1722> the sky.<WG3772> Michael<WG3413> and<WG2532> his<WG846> angels<WG32> made war<WG4170> on<WG2596> the dragon.<WG1404> <WG2532> The dragon<WG1404> and<WG2532> his<WG846> angels<WG32> made war.<WG4170>
<WG2532> They didn't<WG3756> prevail,<WG2480> neither<WG3777> was<WG2147> a place<WG5117> found<WG2147> for him<WG846> any more<WG2089> in<WG1722> heaven.<WG3772>

<WG2532> The great<WG3173> dragon<WG1404> was thrown down,<WG906> the old<WG744> serpent,<WG3789> he who is called<WG2564> the devil<WG1228> and<WG2532> Satan,<WG4567> the deceiver<WG4105> of the whole<WG3650> world.<WG3625> He was thrown down<WG906> to<WG1519> the earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> his<WG846> angels<WG32> were thrown down<WG906> with<WG3326> him.<WG846>

<WG2532> I heard<WG191> a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> saying,<WG3004> "Now<WG737> the salvation,<WG4991> <WG2532> the power,<WG1411> and<WG2532> the Kingdom<WG932> of our<WG2257> God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> the authority<WG1849> of his<WG846> Christ<WG5547> has come;<WG1096> for<WG3754> the accuser<WG2725> of our<WG2257> brothers<WG80> has been thrown down,<WG2598> who<WG3588> accuses<WG2723> them<WG846> before<WG1799> our<WG2257> God<WG2316> day<WG2250> and<WG2532> night.<WG3571>

<WG2532> They<WG846> overcame<WG3528> him<WG846> because<WG1223> of the Lamb<WG721>'s blood,<WG129> and<WG2532> because<WG1223> of the word<WG3056> of their<WG846> testimony.<WG3141> <WG2532> They didn't<WG3756> love<WG25> their<WG846> life,<WG5590> even to<WG891> death.<WG2288>

Therefore<WG1223> <WG5124> rejoice,<WG2165> heavens,<WG3772> and<WG2532> you<WG3588> who dwell<WG4637> in<WG1722> them.<WG846> Woe<WG3759> to the<WG2730> earth<WG1093> and<WG2532> to the sea,<WG2281> because<WG3754> the devil<WG1228> has gone down<WG2597> to<WG4314> you,<WG5209> having<WG2192> great<WG3173> wrath,<WG2372> knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> he has<WG2192> but a short<WG3641> time.<WG2540>"
When the dragon saw that he was thrown down to the earth, he persecuted the woman who gave birth to the male child.

<WG2532> Two<WG1417> wings<WG4420> of the great<WG3173> eagle<WG105> were given<WG1325> to the woman,<WG1135> that<WG2443> she might fly<WG4072> into<WG1519> the wilderness<WG2048> to<WG1519> her<WG846> place,<WG5117> so that<WG3699> she might be nourished<WG5142> for<WG1563> a time,<WG2540> and<WG2532> times,<WG2540> and<WG2532> half<WG2255> a time,<WG2540> from<WG575> the face<WG4383> of the serpent.<WG3789>

<WG2532> The serpent<WG3789> spewed water<WG5204> out<WG906> of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750> after<WG3694> the woman<WG1135> like<WG5613> a river,<WG4215> that<WG2443> he might cause<WG4160> her<WG3778> to be carried away by the stream.<WG4216>

<WG2532> The earth<WG1093> helped<WG997> the woman,<WG1135> and<WG2532> the earth<WG1093> opened<WG455> its<WG846> mouth<WG4750> and<WG2532> swallowed<WG2666> up the river<WG4215> which<WG3739> the dragon<WG1404> spewed out<WG906> of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth.<WG4750>

<WG2532> The dragon<WG1404> grew angry<WG3710> with<WG1909> the woman,<WG1135> and<WG2532> went<WG565> away to make<WG4160> war<WG4171> with<WG3326> the rest<WG3062> of her<WG846> seed,<WG4690> who<WG3588> keep<WG5083> God<WG2316>'s commandments<WG1785> and<WG2532> hold<WG2192> Jesus<WG2424>' <WG5547> testimony.<WG3141>
